channel.title: [317] DevotedScape / Nostalgic 2006 / 5x Exp / Web client / Dedicated Server /
channel.description:
[center][img]http://devotedgaming.net/devotedscape/img/title2/logo.png[/img][/center]
Website: http://devotedgaming.net/devotedscape/
We are a custom 2006 Runescape Server with mostly original 2006 content! We will be adding new features to make the game more fun, but it will still feel like a jagex game!
[b]Server Features![/b]
[ul][li]All Skills! At 20x Exp For Fun Fast Leveling![/li] [li]Music And Sound System!(WIP)[/li] [li]Jagex-like custom content![/li] [li]Nostalgic 2006 Experience![/li] [li]No Quest. All Quest Rewards unlocked![/li][/ul]
[img]http://devotedgaming.net/jerkyjosh/devotedscape.png[/img] [i]Original Server Source By Ahridok[/i]

exp rate is x5 for fast lvling… haha
